Success.Available: You are eligible for daily Group Finder rewards! Go queue up!
Success.TimeLeft: Your daily Group Finder reward resets in (?<Hours>\d+) hours and (?<Minutes>\d+) minutes\.

Error.AlreadyCast: Your line is already cast! I'm sure a fish'll be along soon\.{3}
Error.AlreadyHooked: Something's already bit your line! Quick, type !catch to snag it!

Success.Confirmation: You cast your line out into the water\.
Congratulations! You caught a (?<Length>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) inch, (?<Weight>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) pound (?<Name>\w+)!

Error.Empty: You don't have any fish! Type !cast to try and fish for some!
You haven't caught any fish yet!

Success.Size: You've caught (?<Size>\d+) different types of fish:
Success.Details: Type !fish # for more information on the particular type of fish\.

Error.Empty: You don't have any fish! Type !cast to try and fish for some!

Error.InsufficientFunds: It costs (?<Cost>\d+) Wolfcoins to respect at your level. You have (?<Coins>\d+) coins\.
Error.UserNotFound: You have no coins to respec with\.
Error.InvalidOperation: You can't respec while in a party!

Pending.Warning: You've chosen to respect your class! It will cost you (?<Cost>\d+) coins to respec and you will lose all your items. Reply '(?<CancelCommand>\w+)' to cancel or one of the following codes to select your new class:

TopicList.Response: Here's a list of things you can ask me about: (?<Topics>[^\(]+ \(\d+\)(?: - [^\(]+ \(\d+\))*)

Error.InvalidOperation: You can't invite yourself to a group!
Error.TooManyInvitations: You have the amx number of invites already pending\.
Error.TooManyMembers: You can't have more than 3 party members for a Group Finder dungeon\.
Error.UserInQueue: (?<User>[^ ]+) is currently queued for a Group Finder and cannot be added to the group\.
Error.UserNoClass: (?<User>[^ ]+) is high enough level, but has not picked a class!

Error.DungeonInProgress: You can't kick a party member in the middle of a dungeon!
Error.InvalidOperation: You can't kick yourself from a group! Do !leaveparty instead\.
Error.InvalidUser: Couldn't find that party member to remove\.
Error.NotLeader: You are not the party leader\.

Error.DungeonInProgress: You can't leave your party while a dungeon is in progress!

Error.NotLeader: You must be the party leader to promote\.
Error.UserNotFound: Party member '(?<User>[^ ]+)' not found\. You are sill the party leader\.

Success.Confirmation: You have promoted (?<User>[^ ]+) to Party Leader\.

Error.TooManyMembers: You can't have more than 3 party members for a Dungeon\.
Error.InsufficientFunds: The following party members to do not have enough money to run (?<Name>.*): (?<Users>[^ ]+(?: [^ ]+)*)
Error.InvalidOperation: You are not the party leader!

Success.Confirmation: Party set to 'Ready'\. Be careful adventuring without a full party!

Error.Syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !pet <stable ID>
Error.InvalidId: Invalid Stable ID given\. Check !pets for each pet's stable ID!

Error.Syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !dismiss <stable ID>
Error.InvalidId: Invalid Stable ID given\. Check !pets for each pet's stable ID!
Error.InvalidOperation: That pet is not currently summoned\.

Error.Syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !feed <stable ID>
Error.InvalidId: Invalid Stable ID given\. Check !pets for each pet's stable ID!
Error.InsufficientFunds: You lack the (?<Cost>\d+) wolfcoins to feed your pet! Hop in a Lobos stream soon!
Error.Full: (?<Name>[^ ]{1,16} is full and doesn't need to eat!

Success.Confirmation: You were charged (?<Cost>\d+) wolfcoins to feed (?<Name>[^ ]{1,16}\. They feel refreshed!
Success.LevelUp: (?<Name>[^ ]{1,16} leveled up! They are now level (?<Level>\d+)\.

Error.Syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !release <stable ID>
Error.InvalidId: Invalid Stable ID given\. Check !pets for each pet's stable ID!

Pending.Confirmation: If you release (?<Name>[^ ]{1,16}), they will be gone forever. Are you sure you want to release them\? \(y/n\)

Error.Syntax: Sorry, the data you provided didn't work\. Syntax: !rename <stable id> <new name>
Error.InvalidParameters: Invalid number of parameters\. Note: names cannot contain spaces\.
Error.InvalidId: Sorry, the Stable ID given was invalid\. Please try again\.
Error.TooLong: Name can only be 16 characters max\.
Error.Empty: You don't have any pets to rename\. :\(

Error.Syntax: Invalid number of parameters\. Syntax: !summon <stable ID>
Error.InvalidId: Invalid Stable ID given\. Check !pets for each pet's stable ID!
Error.Corrupt: Sorry, your stableId is corrupt. Lobos is working on this issue :\(

Error.Unknown: Something went wrong\. (?<Name>[^ ]{1,16}) is still with you!

Success.JoinedParty: You successfully joined a party with the following members: (?<First>[^ ]+)(?: (?<Second>[^ ]+))?(?: (?<Third>[^ ]+))?

Fishing.NewRecord: (?<User>[^ ]+) just caught the heaviest (?<Name>\w+) ever! It weighs (?<Weight>\d+(?:\.\d+)?) pounds!

Party.GroupDisbanded: The party leader \((?<User>[^ ]+)\) has left\. Your party has been disbanded\.
Party.InvitationInParty: (?<User>[^ ]+) tried to invite you to a group, but you are already in one! Type '!leaveparty' to abandon your current group\.
Party.InvitationInQueue: (?<User>[^ ]+) tried to invite you to a group, but you are queued in the Group Finder\. Type '!leavequeue' to leave the queue\.
Party.Invited: (?<User>[^ ]+), Level(?<Level>\d+) (?<Class>\w+), has invited you to join a party\. Accept\? \(y/n\)
Party.Promoted: (?<User>[^ ]+) has promoted you to Party Leader\.
Party.Ready: You've reached 3 party members! You're ready to dungeon!
